strapiPost.title: Gulley Park Summer Concert Series Schedule Announced
strapiPost.content:
Get ready to clear your Thursday evenings, because some sweet summertime magic is returning to Fayettevilleâ€™s historic Gulley Park, and you'll not want to miss out!

  • Tunes in the air: The 26th annual Gulley Park Summer Concert Series is on June 9th with concerts every Thursday evening until July 14th. Shows start at 7p around the Gulley Park Gazebo. There will be a local food truck rally each Thursday for those attending the concert, so come with an empty stomach.
  • The lineup is: Bring your family, furry friends, and lawn chairs to listen to Route 358, Blue Water Highway, King Cabbage Brass, Funk Factory, Pert Near Sandstone, and Brennen Leigh this summer!

Click HERE for more information.
